name: Route Censor
description: Removes segments of URLs based on route patterns.

config.markdown: Removes segments of URLs based on route patterns. See [Github Repo](https://github.com/ava-labs/posthog-route-censor-plugin) for more details.

config.name: List of routes following the React Router route patterns.
config.hint: See README for more details and example.

config.name: List of properties to censor
config.hint: Separate properties with commas, without using spaces, like so: `foo,bar,$baz`

config.name: List of $set properties to censor
config.hint: Separate properties with commas, without using spaces, like so: `foo,bar,$baz`

config.name: List of $set_once properties to censor
config.hint: Separate properties with commas, without using spaces, like so: `foo,bar,$baz`
